title: Pandemic-led tech adoption has shortened the techade by several years: Nasscom - Economic Times
content:
1. Pandemic-led tech adoption has shortened the techade by several years: Nasscom  Economic Times
  2. Indian tech industry crosses $200 bn revenue mark in FY22  Mint
  3. Tech sector registers highest growth in 11 years, revenues set to top $200 bn in FY22  Fortune India
  4. India Inc’s search for tech talent to intensify  People Matters
  5. India’s tech industry clocks highest-ever revenue at $227 bn in FY22: NASSCOM  Business Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: "The pandemic actually accelerated the tech adoption and therefore has shortened the decade by several years. And today technology has become indispensable to progress and is the single biggest driver of change,” Rekha Menon, chairperson of Nasscom said.
